Name: Funeral Doll with Two Ponytails
Description: The standing nude doll depicts a woman with her hair in two cone-like ponytails that reach her shoulders. She has no facial features except two lightly engraved eyes. She has a dotted line representing a long necklace hanging between her breasts. The breasts are cylindrical in shape with holes for the nipples. The navel and feminine parts are also dotted. Another dotted line depicts a bracelet adorning her wrist. Her joined legs are well shaped and her fingers and toes are clearly portrayed
